WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing due to the work on the status form, error reporting, and  armory / network communication enhancements.  If this continues to be an issue, please open a new work item with the latest details
WorkItem.Description:
Everytime I try to open a document in the new b11, it looks like there are some unfortunate attempts to contact the very laggy european armory (to search for better items?)... and then, after several minutes and several errors, it stop responding.
Â 
Would it be possible to make those armory contacts optional?

Comments.Message:
It's attempting to contact the armory in order to load items that it doesn't already know. So no, they're not optional. Sorry, just try again later is all I can suggest :(

I was hoping that the Armory would improve, but it just seems to get more and more unreliable all the time. I may look into getting item data from Wowhead, again.

I'm working on a status pane while its performing updates, this should improve the user experience a little in the cases where the armory is down or being very slow.

However; as Astrylian noted, without pulling the data, the app won't be able to really give gear evaluations
